author: kocolosk
msg: synchronous logging, COUCHDB-761.  Patch by Randall Leeds.
This patch fixes a bug where calls to get the log level could time
out, resulting in an unexpected {ref(), integer()} message in the
client's mailbox.  This would crash some gen_servers that did not
